properties.name: security.token.expiration-time
properties.description: The time that will be alive the token to be used

properties.name: security.token.time-unit
properties.description: The unit of time that will be used in expiration time

properties.name: security.rsa.private-key
properties.description: The private key to use for sign JWT

properties.name: security.rsa.public-key
properties.description: The public key to validate JWT
